Text: The Return of Jafar:  The film was released on May 20, 1994 and serves as the first episode of the "Aladdin" animated series.

<Text: The Return of Jafar:  Culled from material originally intended for the first five episodes of the series, It was the first Disney direct-to-video animated film.>
